original_text: For there were many in the assembly who had not consecrated themselves. Therefore the Levites had to slaughter the Passover lamb for everyone who was not clean, to consecrate it to the Lord.
korean_text: 회중 가운데 많은 사람이 자신들을 성결하게 하지 못하였으므로 레위 사람들이 모든 부정한 사람을 위하여 유월절 양을 잡아 그들로 여호와 앞에서 성결하게 하였으나

sentences.original_text: For there were many in the assembly
Therefore the Levites had to slaughter the Passover lamb
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 레위 사람들은 유월절 어린 양을 잡아야 했습니다.

sentences.original_text: for everyone who was not clean
to consecrate it to the Lord
